title: Aural set, trio sonata - final cadence

content.description:
Questions 23-27 are based on an excerpt of music that will be played four times. A diagram of the excerpt is provided below. Before listening to the music for the first time, please look at the diagram and read Questions 23‑27.

Courtesy of Naxos of America, Inc.
content.question: The final cadence is

choices.label: an authentic cadence in the tonic key
a plagal cadence in the tonic key
a half cadence in the dominant key
an authentic cadence in the dominant key

content.answer: an authentic cadence in the dominant key

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
